Poker Hands.val: Q♣ J♣ 10♣ 9♣ 8♣ (Five cards in sequence, all of the same suit)
9♣ 9♠ 9♦ 9♥ J♥ (Four cards of one rank and any other card)
3♣ 3♠ 3♦ 6♣ 6♥ (Three matching cards of one rank and two matching cards of another rank)
Q♣ 10♣ 7♣ 6♣ 4♣ (All five cards are of the same suit, but not in sequence)
Q♣ J♠ 10♠ 9♥ 8♥ (Five cards of sequential rank in at least two different suits)
2♦ 2♠ 2♣ K♠ 6♥  (Three cards of the same rank, plus two cards of another rank)
J♥ J♣ 4♣ 4♠ 9♥ (Two cards of the same rank, plus two cards of another rank that match each other but not the first pair, plus any card not of either rank)
4♥ 4♠ K♠ 10♦ 5♠ (Two cards of one rank, plus three cards which are not of this rank nor the same as each other)
K♥ J♥ 8♣ 7♦ 4♠ (No hand is made, and the only thing of any potential meaning in the hand is the highest card)
